text: Sanjay's Super Team is a computer-animated short movie made by Pixar Animation Studios. It was written and directed by Sanjay Patel. The movie was based on Patel's childhood. The movie premiered on June 8, 2015 at the Annecy International Animated Film Festival in France. The short movie came out with Pixar's The Good Dinosaur on November 18, 2015. == References == Category:2015 computer-animated movies Category:Pixar short movies
title: Sanjay's Super Team
